text: Merrilliopanax chinensis is a species of plant in the family Araliaceae. It is endemic to China. ==Sources== * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Merrilliopanax chinensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Merrilliopanax chinensis
